basics.name: Richie Lombano
basics.label: Staff Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary: Hands-on Site Reliability Engineering leader who champions high-impact initiatives to build successful SRE organizations. I prioritize GitOps, self-service, and observability to deliver secure, reliable platforms that empower Product and Engineering teams with full ownership over the services they deliver.

work.name: Solar Mosaic
work.summary: Spearheaded key initiatives to enhance our platform's stability and efficiency. Reduced Kubernetes node count by 75% and cloud costs by 50%, saving $600,000 annually and significantly improving service availability. I lead our CI/CD and infrastructure architecture and actively contribute to the health and security of our services. Collaborated with the application architecture committee to help design and approve reference architectures. Currently, I'm leading the development of our internal developer platform, aiming to streamline self-service golden paths for our engineering teams.
highlights: Migrated from kOps to EKS with Karpenter Autoscaling
Modernized API Gateway w/ NGINX & ingress-nginx
Led Platform engineering initiative to build a self-service portal for engineers that improved developer velocity
Owned CI/CD for secure SDLC workflows and Observability best practices
Deployed Keycloak to replace expensive Salesforce Login implementation

work.name: Panzura
work.summary: Improved the DevOps culture at Panzura by integrating tooling and policies designed to help Product teams release faster while maintaining high security standards. Leveraging Infrastructure-as-Code, CI/CD pipelines, observability tooling, self-service, and an overall shift-left mentality wherever possible. Leading a team of three engineers.

work.name: Vology
highlights: Designed and migrated customer IT infrastructure to public cloud
Defined reference architectures for Azure offerings

work.name: RobbinsKersten Direct
work.summary: Managed post-acquisition IT setup and built secure infrastructure and workflows.

work.name: Lincare Holdings, Inc.
work.summary: Managed deployment and support for thousands of workstations and servers, ensuring HIPAA compliance.

work.name: Elite Networks
work.summary: Provided IT support and maintained infrastructure and uptime for hosted services.

awards.title: All Florida Community College Academic Team Scholarship

projects.name: Agent Based AI Chatbot
projects.description: An agentic AI chatbot designed to work with an IRC channel.

projects.name: Resume Pipeline
projects.description: A simple pipeline to generate my resume in various formats using the popular project, JSON Resume. This allows me to keep my resume up to date with minimal effort and ensure it's consistant across all platforms.

projects.name: Resume Website
projects.description: My resume website rendered with Next.JS and Tailwind CSS. An expansion of my previous project that uses modern web frameworks.
